channel.title: Anybody looked in the Pastebin lately?
channel.description:
All thats been posted recently is all crap.Take a look for yourselves: http://moparisthebest.zeeblo.com/
Hmm we have: Penis Time to Die Admin stuff below.. all 3000 sumthin lines of it.
Time for a cleanout?

item.title: Anybody looked in the Pastebin lately?
item.dc:creator: @BlackThursday BlackThursday
item.description:
@BlackThursday wrote:

man… strange this topic hasn;t gone to spam or flamewar yet… good run… good run.

Read full topic

item.title: Anybody looked in the Pastebin lately?
item.dc:creator: @SuperNewb SuperNewb
item.description:
@SuperNewb wrote:

my ten cents:

1.have a “report bad paste” button
2.log on your forum account to paste stuff
3.clean out the spam

I support #3 the most

Read full topic

item.title: Anybody looked in the Pastebin lately?
item.dc:creator: @oddinn686 oddinn686
item.description:
@oddinn686 wrote:

Yea it does look like a lot of spam.

This one kind of made me laugh though:

raw ar2 source java5 


class HelloWorld {
        public static void main (String args[]) {
                for (;;) {
                        System.out.print("Hello World ");                 
                }
        }
}

I guess raw really was working on making an ar2.

Read full topic
item.source: Anybody looked in the Pastebin lately?

item.title: Anybody looked in the Pastebin lately?
item.dc:creator: @BlackThursday BlackThursday
item.description:
@BlackThursday wrote:

I think we should make it a rule that any script posted on the site also should be in the pastebin. That makes it easier to acceses and takes care fo the “Is there a Script for This?” threads.

Read full topic
item.source: Anybody looked in the Pastebin lately?

item.title: Anybody looked in the Pastebin lately?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:7, topic:4026”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=5053.msg51443#msg51443 date=1150842269]
Mopar, how about an IP logging thing in the pastebin, so that when someone posts, you can see if it matches someone from this forum. Man thats disgusting in there, I think it needs some moderation.
[/quote]

it does log ips ;)[/quote]

Coo, if I were you I’d ban all retards from the pastebin who spam if their IP matches anyone from here. Although, that might be a little pointless because they would probably rebel and just spam even more.

Read full topic
